an9.25:1.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti, tassetaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallaṁ vacanāya:
an9.25:1.2: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
an9.25:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti?
an9.25:2.2: ‘Vītarāgaṁ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.3: ‘vītadosaṁ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.4: ‘vītamohaṁ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.5: ‘asarāgadhammaṁ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.6: ‘asadosadhammaṁ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.7: ‘asamohadhammaṁ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.8: ‘anāvattidhammaṁ me cittaṁ kāmabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.9: ‘anāvattidhammaṁ me cittaṁ rūpabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti;
an9.25:2.10: ‘anāvattidhammaṁ me cittaṁ arūpabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti.
an9.25:2.11: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṁ suparicitaṁ hoti, tassetaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallaṁ vacanāya:
an9.25:2.12: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’”ti.
